snippet: REHR--Estelle. March 2nd, one month shy of her 100th birthday, passed away peacefully in Oakland, CA with her daughter Ellen and son-in-law Gary Sirbu at her side. Estelle (Dorothy Esther Toren) loving wife of Morris Rehr for 49 years was a devoted mother to Ellen and Phyllis (Robert) Zadra, delighted grandmother to Steven (Rebecca), David Sirbu, Gabrielle (Mark) and Jaime Zadra (Jeffrey) and joyful great-grandmother to Talia, Jonah, Zachary, Raphael, Henry and Zoey. A strong and independent woman she will be sorely missed. 1/3
